#summary Verfies that your partner key and partner secret are valid.

==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||*required*||partner_key||string||Assigned partner key. Click [http://www.tokbox.com/view/developer TokBox API Key] to request one|| ||
|| ||partner_secret_hash||string||MD5 hash of your partner_secret appended to your partner_key|| ||
</table>

==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
||*Code*||*Exception*||*Description*||
||400||UnauthorizedPartnerException||Missing field partner_key||
</table>
